name: Pufferfish Panic: Proliferating Pressure
description:
Jean-jacques, the pufferfish, went to the ocean with a particular clown fish but got bored of it. So now he's coming back! And to not be lonely, he brought a few friends back with him! Help him reach its bowl and bring a lot of friends!

  1. Buy kitchen elements from the shop.
  2. Guide lost pufferfishs to their aquarium.
  3. Create the biggest pufferfish loop !

Controls

You only need your mouse to play with our fishs :mouse_three_button: 

  • Left click : Buy and place elements.
  • Right click : Cancel purchase / destroy already placed elements.
  • Mouse wheel : Rotate elements before placing them.
